teaser: Filmmaker Penny Lane brings our long, national kitchen nightmare to a close with this Nixonian joke. And she has some serious insight into the subject; she joins us later in the show to talk about her new documentary about the 37th President.
title: “Nixon in the Kitchen” – Penny Lane
description: Filmmaker Penny Lane brings our long, national kitchen nightmare to a close with this Nixonian joke. And she has some serious insight into the subject; she joins us later in the show to talk about her new documentary about the 37th President.
